title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama local server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap Ollama models into chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); supports multi-user, RAG, and plugins.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive terminal UI for chatting with Ollama models, written in Rust.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; embeddable in Spring or Android apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, and manage models from Ruby or Rails.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async APIs and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub with one-line run commands.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot frontend that streams Ollama responses with Tailwind styling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference RAG pipeline combining Ollama local LLM with Hugging Face embeddings and Chroma.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to chat, embed, and manage Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in deepset pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin enabling local AI assistance for block summarization and translation via Ollama.
